dialogue: Oru vaati mudivu pannitenna, en pecha naane kekka maaten.
meaning: Once I decide, I won't even listen to myself.

dialogue: You don’t need a weapon to be powerful. Just a strong heart is enough.
meaning: Courage is your ultimate weapon.

dialogue: Success ah follow panradhu dhaan hero, aana failure ah handle panradhu dhaan legend!
meaning: Chasing success makes you a hero; handling failure makes you a legend.

dialogue: Vaazhkai oru vattam da... innikku nee keezha irundha, naalaikku mela iruppa.
meaning: Life is a circle… if you’re down today, you’ll rise tomorrow.

dialogue: Naan dhana varuven nu thonicha... flight la ukkandhu varen!
meaning: If I decide to come… I’ll arrive flying!

dialogue: Naan oru thadava sonna nooru thadava sonna madhiri!
meaning: If I say it once, it's like I’ve said it a hundred times!

dialogue: Naan solradha seiven, solladhadhaum seiven.
meaning: I’ll do what I say… and also what I don’t say.

dialogue: Vandhutaanya… paathutaya?
meaning: He's here… did you see?

dialogue: Baasha... naa oru thadava sonna, nooru thadava sonna madhiri!
meaning: If I say it once, it’s as good as saying it a hundred times.

dialogue: Enna pathi theriyama pesa koodadhu!
meaning: Don't talk about me without knowing me.

dialogue: Naalu per sonna naan mariduvana… naan solradha dhaan seiven!
meaning: I won’t change just because others say something. I do what I decide.

dialogue: Therikka vidalama?
meaning: Shall we tear it up? (Let’s go full power!)

dialogue: Time ah vandhutta... aprom naan pathukiren!
meaning: Once the time comes… I’ll take care of everything.

dialogue: I am waiting.
meaning: Stylish one-liner before the storm.

dialogue: Enaku oru padathula edhavadhu nadikka sollunga... naan nadichenna Oscar kidaikum!
meaning: Give me any role, I’ll win an Oscar!

dialogue: Yaarume kai thodatha level ku poganum!
meaning: Rise to a level where no one can touch you!

dialogue: Style is not in the dress... it's in the walk!
meaning: Style comes from your attitude, not your clothes.

dialogue: Lusu aana thaan mass panalam nu nenachaan!
meaning: Only a fool thinks mass image is enough.

dialogue: Naan kadavul illa… aana unakku naan dhaan judgement!
meaning: I’m not God… but for you, I am your judgement day.

dialogue: Nee dhaan mudivu panna maatan... naan dhaan!
meaning: You won’t decide… I will!

dialogue: Vaada… vaada… vaada mapla!
meaning: Come on, da! (Stylish invite to action)

dialogue: En vazhi... thani vazhi!
meaning: My path… is a unique path!

dialogue: Naan solrathaiyum seiven, sollathathaiyum seiven!
meaning: I’ll do what I say… and also what I don’t say.

dialogue: Arasiyal la idhellam saatharnamappa!
meaning: In politics, this is all common!

dialogue: Naalu perukaga nalladhu panna enaku pidikkadhu.
meaning: I don't do good things just for show.

dialogue: Avan evanukku thunaiya irunthaan... avan thaan kadavul!
meaning: The one who supports someone in need… is God himself.

dialogue: Otha solla aasa pattaen... solliten!
meaning: I waited to say it… and I finally did!

dialogue: Naan konjam mental!
meaning: I’m a little mentally unstable!

dialogue: Vetri oda varuven... gethu oda iruppen!
meaning: I’ll come with victory… and stay with style!

dialogue: Maari thaan da local!
meaning: I’m the local kingpin, bro!

dialogue: Naan single dhaan irukken… aana romba happy-a irukken!
meaning: I’m single… and I’m very happy about it!

dialogue: Yaaru solli kudutha life-a illa… naan thaan build pannina life da!
meaning: This life wasn’t given to me by anyone… I built it myself!

dialogue: Naan thirumbi vandhuten da!
meaning: I’ve made my comeback, da!

dialogue: Life-la ellam fast-a nadakanum na… oru nimishamum waste panna koodadhu!
meaning: If you want life to move fast… you can’t waste even a minute!

dialogue: Naa comedy panradhukku illa da... life-a survive panradhukku dhaan!
meaning: I don’t do comedy for fun… I do it to survive life!

dialogue: Ellarukum dhaan kashtam irukum... aana yosikkara time illa.
meaning: Everyone has problems… but no time to think about them.

dialogue: Vaazhkai oru quiz competition illa da… repeat panna mudiyadhu!
meaning: Life isn’t a quiz competition… you don’t get second chances!

dialogue: Unaku pudicha vishayathula thappu pannalum correct dhaan!
meaning: If it’s something you love, even a mistake feels right!
